vlive.korean: 애초에 시작할 때부터 조금... Even from the start, a little... 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 홍Night🌖🌧
vlive.english: Even from the start, a little...

vlive.korean: 그러네! - 그러면 애초에... - 그래! Yeah! - Then at first... - Yes! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE UNIV. 패션동아리 동아리방
근데 애초에 시민이란 단어가 없지 않아? But there's no such thing as a citizen, is there? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.18
vlive.english: But there's no such thing as a citizen, is there?

vlive.korean: 근데 이거 애초에 종이호일 해야 되는 거 아니에요? But wasn't I supposed to use wax paper from the start? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
vlive.english: But wasn't I supposed to use wax paper from the start?

vlive.korean: 근데 색깔은 또 예쁘니까 애초에 내가 고른 이유가... But the color is pretty... That's why I brought them. 듣기 View video NCT : 삼대삼💚
vlive.english: But the color is pretty... That's why I brought them.

examples.korean: The plan was fatally flawed from the start. 발음듣기 그 계획은 애초 치명적인 결함이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The plan was fatally flawed from the start. 발음

examples.korean: What started her off on that crazy idea? 발음듣기 (애초에) 어째서 그녀가 그런 말도 안 되는 생각을 하게 되었죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What started her off on that crazy idea? 발음

examples.korean: The marriage was doomed from the start. 발음듣기 그 결혼 생활은 애초부터 불행해질 운명이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The marriage was doomed from the start. 발음

examples.korean: I made it clear right from the outset that I disapproved. 발음듣기 나는 찬성하지 않는다는 것을 애초부터 분명히 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I made it clear right from the outset that I disapproved. 발음

examples.korean: A little forward planning at the outset can save you a lot of expense. 발음듣기 애초에 조금 앞서 계획을 세우면 많은 비용을 줄일 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A little forward planning at the outset can save you a lot of expense. 발음
